name: 100% Orange Juice - Character Song Pack: Ultimate Weapon Girl
detailed_description:
Prepare to die of cuteness overload! The first official Character Song Pack for 100% Orange Juice contains the Sham & Sora (Cuties) character song "Ultimate Weapon Girl" in 5 different versions!

Track List

  • Track 1: Ultimate Weapon Girl
  • Track 2: Ultimate Weapon Girl (Sora version)
  • Track 3: Ultimate Weapon Girl (Sham version)
  • Track 4: Ultimate Weapon Girl (Instrumental)
  • Track 5: Ultimate Weapon Girl (Bonus Track)

Lyrics: Hono
Composition: DEKU
Vocals: Sora (Maruyama Miki) and Sham (Fukuyama Saori)

All the tracks are in .wav and .mp3 format and will be downloaded to the game folder.

supported_languages:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 2.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct3D compatible video card with 128MB memory or more
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card
